name: Gem Collector (itch) (DominikMe)
description:
This is my first 3D Game that I made in Unity. I was following Thomas Brush's Easy 3D Game Tutorials. I made that game in 3 hours. 

In the game you will need to find all orbs/gems to complete level.Game has only one level now. There is no story behind this game, I just made it out of my head and with help of Thomas Brush's 3D Game Tutorials.

Controls:

W-Forward

S-Backward

A-Left

D-Right
